summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2917, for the improvement of Ferdinand Street, from 42nd Avenue South to 49th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary cross-walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage under Ordinance No. 35254 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
